programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores in exchange for good points! Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias is doing way better than them in an online game called Galatrek. Tobias admits he earns "good points" doing chores for his parents which he then exchanges for dollars to buy cool stuff for Galatrek. If Gumball and Darwin do Tobias chores they can earn his "good points" and use them for Galatrek. Gumball and Darwin think theyve hit the jackpot. But these "good points" may not be quite as good as Tobias claims...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Rocky suggests that the Elmore Junior High kids skip school, the bus is boarded by criminals who seem to want to teach them the importance of school attendance. The masked culprits are clearly the childrens parents, faking a heist to teach them a lesson. But when the police get involved for real, it becomes clear the parents arent the ones pulling the strings.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: As night falls in Elmore the Moon takes us on a tour through the various dreams - and nightmares - of the towns slumbering inhabitants. Each characters dream shows us their innermost desires their greatest fears or just how plain weird they are.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais has been facepalming every time her family does something stupid, which has led to a serious medical condition.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball tries to convince Leslie hes an expert on all things plant-related. However, when Leslie realises Gumball hasnt got a clue what hes talking about, he decides to call his bluff. An escalation of dangerous dares and stunts ensue as they try to out-plant each other.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After accidentally bumping into each other in the grocery aisle, Nicole and her parents have it out. The Wattersons discover why Nicole and her parents havent been on speaking terms for so long. The kids decide to bring about a reunion, in order to secure that backlog of birthday and holiday presents...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Nicole decides to pay the cable bill in person at Chanax, she leaves specific instructions for Richard to stay in the car. However hes far too tempted by the vending machine in the foyer to follow her advice. Chanax believes Richard is their mysterious founder and follow his every whim, leading to their inevitable demise.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are at the convenience store considering playing truant. Larry warns them that if they dont take their education seriously theyll end up like him. To prove his point, Larry lets Gumball and Darwin work some of his many roles to make them appreciate the value of a good education.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin argue with the Internet and make him mad. So mad in fact that he seeks to wipe out humanity and, whilst doing so, malfunctions! The whole of Elmore is plunged into a time before technology. Its actually pretty nice. Will Gumball and Darwin decide to leave the internet unplugged?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin learn that Hector is not so happy being giant-sized. So they decide to help him by creating a potion that will shrink him down to the size of an average person. However creating a magic potion is not as easy as it sounds, and the results can go spectacularly wrong...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket. / Richard has lost all of the familys money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. / Darwin joins the school marching band and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo. / Rob creates a variety of spinoff Elmore shows and formats in order to replace Gumball.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Pennys family are unhappy that shes decided to come out of her shell… literally. And Penny wants her family to come out of their shell...also literally. They are at an impasse so who do they turn to in their time of trouble? Gumball of course! Needless to say he is way outside of his comfort zone...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball tries to save Darwin from being kissed by a girl.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Principal Brown tries to "fix" Gumballs dysfunctional family.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin babysit Anais "responsibly", whilst "irresponsibly" flooding the house.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball goes to school in a dress and becomes the darling of Elmore High.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin challenge Dad to a "lazy-off".

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamputs day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museums precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation, when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

Seeing that she wants more, Grizzy decides to become a champ in the sport. But for that to happen, the Lemmings will need to let him work out.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. To recover the supply of cookies, which were to be his afternoon snack, Grizzy has no qualms about making the Lemmings sled skid out of control. When the sled hits a superheros spacecraft, a mysterious costume falls out.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch his favorite program. / The Lemmings discover that by changing the speed limit sign on the side of the road they can create a huge draft that is just perfect for their extreme kiting game. / While trying to stop the Lemmings Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. / The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet-tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. / The Lemmings have unearthed a strange little gadget from amongst the Forest Rangers belongings: a hand spinner. / The Lemmings play with figurines of wild Canadian animals.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a new generation Tamagotchi game on the Rangers tablet: the camera scans the player and gives him a virtual avatar of himself to take care of. You must feed it, put it to bed, play with it... Grizzy takes his new responsibility as a "parent" very seriously, but the Lemmings decide to complete the virtual Grizzys education with far more intense activities.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings find a vase with a genie inside that will make anyones dreams come true if they only let him out by rubbing the vase. There is nonetheless one little snag: the effects of the genies magic instantly wear off as soon as he returns to his vase and the lid shuts.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up on stage at the opera house...in a dress! / Mr Bean becomes a taxi driver after being locked in a taxi. / Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. / Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has a new friend - a Seagull but sometimes friends can overstay their welcome. / Mr Bean tries to get some muscles but attempts a shortcut to physical perfection. / Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. / Mr Bean becomes a taxi driver after being locked in a taxi.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Beans plan seems to be working - until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irmas admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean tries to get some muscles but attempts a shortcut to physical perfection. / Mr Bean has a new friend - a Seagull but sometimes friends can overstay their welcome. / Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. / Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit loves Chanterelles art so much. But when Chanterelle makes a statue of Lilit, she cant stand it.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Our Mushlers learn that Mushpie absolutely cannot resist an adorable look.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chanterelle absolutely loves everything about bark-boarding... until she tries it!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Everyone thinks that Puff has done what no Mushable has ever done before - touched Muddlers mud pile. But has he really?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chep offers to look after the Golden Compost while Sushi-Mushi is away. But it smells so delicious that the Mushables will do anything to taste it. Its up to Chep to stop them!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Take to the skies over Gotham with Batwing and her friend best jet-friend Goldie the Arrowplane!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When the Undertakers realm is cluttered with malfunctioning magic from the Wizard, he blames the Wizard and takes the Wizard and Dorothy as his prisoners under the rainbow. Its up to Dorothy and her friends to help the Wizard break them out - using all the Wizards broken magic!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: After Wilhelmina transfers Hungry Tigers appetite to Lyman to help him win a pie-eating contest, Lyman becomes a voracious, uncontrollable eating machine!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When the Rainbows daughter, Polychrome, falls off the Rainbow and straight into Tin Mans arms, the gang must come up with a plan to reunite her with her father!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When the Wicked Witch uses a new wand to suck her magic out of the Wizard, the magic morphs into a Magical Mist Monster and runs off. Now the race is on to chase down the monster and finally get her magic back!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Ojo thinks his luck has finally changed when he finds a treasure map that he hopes will lead him to fame, fortune and riches!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings take a liking to an endangered crab on the beach and decide to shelter it from a seagull who is using its shell to open coconuts. They bring it home to a disgruntled Grizzy, who wants to watch TV in peace while snacking on Cheetos. When the Lemmings turn into full-fledged crab rescuers, the house is soon overrun with crustaceans. Grizzy decides to use the seagull to get rid of the crabs. But the Lemmings - ready to do anything to protect their new friends - embark the entire house, like a raft on water.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings boat, he could come closer to a zone thats teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owners ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces. How can Grizzy prevent the "infiltrating" Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey. Grizzy would like to impress his beloved she-bear by soaring majestically through the sky. But to confiscate the magic totem from the Lemmings, who are now as sharp as eagles, Grizzy will have to use the cunning... of a puma.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock. Just as Grizzy is about to destroy the instrument, he realizes it can make harmonious sounds too. Will this be enough to seduce the she-bear hes in love with?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover an ancient Amerindian table with the power to show you past events. They relive their prehistoric ancestors first confrontations and learn that chocolate spread was invented long long ago.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! / Mr Bean attempts to retrieve his cash card and "accidently" ends up inside a bank vault. / Mr Bean has to look after an injured Mrs Wicket whose demands start to become a pain. / Mr Bean builds a car washing machine that attracts all manner of customers.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.sub-title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes a famous internet sensation. / Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesnt trust. / Mr Bean tries to be romantic but his idea of romance is very different from his girlfriends. / Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A magical hat creates mayhem for Tom Jerry and Spike. / Tom accidentally zaps a marionette. / Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / Tom and Jerry each build their own booby-trapped bunker. / Spike hasnt been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. Thats why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. / When Toms hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case hes sent to recover at the local animal hospital. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ricks got a procedure that requires him to not eat or drink for 12 hours. Thats not a lot of time for an everyday human, but to Rick its a lifetime. He makes a house rule: if he cant eat, no one can. Luckily, Jerry and Spike have a stockpile - no skin off their backs. Tom, on the other hand, is not so lucky. With the cupboards and refrigerator padlocked shut, the overly dramatic cat is left to survive the long cold night on the brink of starvation. Thats when he invites Little Quacker for a sleepover and Jerrys plan for a quiet night turns ugly. Little Quacker is tired of being the nice duck and between Jerry and Little Quacker, Toms got his work cut out for him. In the end, Rick has his dates wrong and Tom will have to go through this all over again next week.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch locks Tom in the basement to keep him from attending a date with Toodles. When Butch shows up instead Toodles suprises him with babysitting her misbehaving nieces and nephews. Tom tries to escape from the basement but keeps getting blocked by Jerry and Tuffy who think its a monster downstairs.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A bet between two farmers over who can raise the biggest pig goes haywire for the farm hands.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An ancient flying machine is discovered in Postlewaite Manor.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An oompah land retelling of the Rumplestiltskein story.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A couple of tricksters use Lil Quacker as their "magnificent" side show act in order to bilk the locals out of their cash.

programme.title: Karbikool
programme.desc: The bugs talk about taking their time.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Boss is writing his new novel but he finds it extremely hard to focus with all the noise and disturbance at the lab. Looking for some tranquillity, Boss finally settles inside the old cannon at launch pad of the lab and accidentally gets fired out all the way to the moon!! Its completely quiet on the moon, just what Boss needs. He cant stop writing. Back at the lab, they build a rocket to bring Boss back! Hopefully boss gets to finish his novel first.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are so obsessed with catching Lamput that even in their dreams, the chase goes on. Its really not a restful sleep, when you keep waking up sweating from horrid visions that, lets face it, just remind you what a nightmare your day job is. The Docs make the brave decision to see a therapist about these terrible dreams. In the waiting room is the last orange blob they wanted to see; apparently a life of hot pursuit is taking its toll on Lamput, too. The shrink will have to resort to some very unconventional treatments.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs spot Lamput in the audience of a magic show and try to catch him. The chase takes them backstage where Lamput evades the Docs with the help of different magic contraptions until Specs and Skinny unknowingly ends up on stage. They become reluctant assistants to the Magician who is about to perform some death-defying tricks - with the help of the Docs!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. Hes too powerful for the Batwheels to stop, but Buff finds a friendly solution to end the city shaking shenanigans.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: When one of Lewis teeth falls out, no little tooth fairy comes to see him. Instead, the whole of Wonderland converges upon him! Basically, in this world, a loose tooth is an opportunity for making a wish, which makes it a very sought-after commodity among the Wonderlanders!! In the midst of all this squabbling, Alice must use cunning to help her good friend Lewis hold onto his precious tooth!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Its the Night of the Stars in Wonderland and Lewis invites Alice to see the show. Afterwards, our two friends make an unexpected encounter in the garden: they find a little star thats eager to see daytime! Alice is only too happy to help it fulfill its dream. But when it starts gradually losing its star dust, they realize theres a risk it might not be able to rise back into the sky to shine once again alongside its relatives. Alice and Lewis must prevent that danger from occurring, ASAP! And so off they head to the Valley of the Night!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Vivie discovers shes not amazing at soccer the first time she tries, she thinks shell never be good at it. Barney creates fantastical practice drills to help Vivie learn how practice can help her get better.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mels pretzel is eaten by a pigeon, Barney creates a high-seas adventure to find another, but it goes awry when Captain Mel doesnt listen to her crew. Mel realizes its important to listen to others when youre working as a team.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of… doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, its chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger are asked to dog-sit for a friends French poodle, Sabrina, Tom is initially on his guard, but soon hes practically eating out of her hand. Next, Spike falls for Sabrina and does everything he can to impress her with how kind he is to Tom. How long will everyones behavior be affected by Sabrinas presence?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom, Jerry and Tuffy have a run-in with a moving suit of armor. The knight scares Tom away, but Jerry makes a brave stand because he thinks the knight is Tom in disguise. Jerry eventually trips the suit of armor and finds out its inhabited by three kittens. Relieved at first, the pets soon realize that battling one haunted knight is nothing compared to battling three real-life kittens.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerrys high-born cousin Count DaCalories—a haughty city mouse—visits the estate. At first, he acts sleek and refined, but soon he cant resist pigging out and going on multiple kitchen raids. As his paunch grows, it becomes more and more difficult for him to outrun Tom and stay out of sight of the Duchesss visitor.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: In Catsylvania, the peasant mice oompah band plays onstage at the auditorium. As the bandleaders lovely daughter, Gretta, hits a high note in her rousing song, Tom—in a mask and hood—swings in on a rope and abducts her. Van Mouseling and the peasant band chase him through the rafters and backstage, but Tom escapes with his captive to a subterranean lair. Will the mice manage to free Gretta?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After Tom drifts off to sleep, a tumbleweed blows into his face, and he discovers that the kitchen looks like an old west saloon. The bartender, Spike, and customers recognize him as the Catnip Kid. Then he sees himself in the mirror—dressed like a gunslinger, a silver-plated pea shooter holstered to his hip! Will Sherriff Jerry bring him to justice in this western adventure?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch locks Tom in the basement to keep him from attending a date with Toodles. When Butch shows up instead Toodles suprises him with babysitting her misbehaving nieces and nephews. Tom tries to escape from the basement but keeps getting blocked by Jerry and Tuffy who think its a monster downstairs.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings take a liking to an endangered crab on the beach and decide to shelter it from a seagull who is using its shell to open coconuts. They bring it home to a disgruntled Grizzy, who wants to watch TV in peace while snacking on Cheetos. When the Lemmings turn into full-fledged crab rescuers, the house is soon overrun with crustaceans. Grizzy decides to use the seagull to get rid of the crabs. But the Lemmings - ready to do anything to protect their new friends - embark the entire house, like a raft on water.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings boat, he could come closer to a zone thats teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owners ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a bottle containing a love potion anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings clumsiness and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him. But the insect can never hold out long enough for the Lemmings to swipe the jar before being knocked out. They decide to give the fly intensive sports training.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the rangers collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call. For Grizzy, its a super-practical way of being waited on by feathered servants, while the Lemmings see it as a golden opportunity to have a squadron which obeys at the drop of a dime.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages the space station. Amongst the debris that falls in front of the cabin, the Lemmings discover a box that cancels out gravity.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame well never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. She agrees as long as Bean helps her with cooking cleaning etc. 24 hours later and Bean is desperate to see the back of her. The feeling is mutual. But then Mrs. Wicket starts itching …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery and the amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made Bean opens up his own strange successful coffee bar …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman. He tries increasingly ridiculous ways to warm up his tea his toothpaste and himself before venturing out to discover somewhere to hunker down and get warm.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper …

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs run out of puff and decide to cut some corners. All it takes is a sharpie, as it happens; just change a wanted poster to offer a huge reward, and bingo! The public are gonna do your work for you. Weirdly quickly, a hard-boiled granny shows up with Lamput under her arm. Things turn ugly when she actually expects to be paid the reward. Most unreasonable. Not even an odd-jobs montage can pay this giant bill; the Docs get desperate and turn to crime, which works about as well for them as it usually does. Specs and Skinny end up in the clink, the granny pockets a heap of cash, and Lamput is yet again the one that got away.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Vivie discovers shes not amazing at soccer the first time she tries, she thinks shell never be good at it. Barney creates fantastical practice drills to help Vivie learn how practice can help her get better.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mels pretzel is eaten by a pigeon, Barney creates a high-seas adventure to find another, but it goes awry when Captain Mel doesnt listen to her crew. Mel realizes its important to listen to others when youre working as a team.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Batman refuses to race with the Joker, Prank goads Bam into a rematch - can Bam learn not to give in to the bullys dares and take the high road?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. After struggling to solve a riddle from Riddlers helicopter Quizz, Redbird must learn to speak up and share his ideas with the Batwheels if they hope to figure out the villains scheme.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: The Queen and Alice are playing against each other in a croquet game Wonderland-style: if Alice wins (which the Queen sees as impossible!), all the Wonderland residents will hereafter be allowed to win - not just the Queen, as has always been the case up until now!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Today, Wonderland is celebrating "Qweensmas!" Well, more precisely, the Queen is the only one celebrating because at this time of year, all the residents have to give her their stuff, whether they like it or not! Alice finds the whole tradition so unfair and speaks her mind to the Queen. So they come to an agreement: the monarch will give her subjects their stuff back… if and only if Alice and Lewis give her a better gift than ALL the other gifts combined! Mission impossible? Not for Alice and Lewis! No sir: this year, EVERYONE in Wonderland will be spending a very Merry Qweensmas, not just the Queen!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: ""Chasing Lamput" turns out to be the ultimate backstage pass; the Docs pursue the orange blob through the dressing room and directly onto the stage of a gigantic stadium rock concert. The crowd goes wild. Which raises questions about their taste in music, to be honest; Skinny plays guitar like hes gotten himself tangled in the strings (which he has), and Specs drumming, well, its certainly got passion. No taste, skill or rhythm, but certainly passion. The stage ends up in tatters by the time the actual band arrives. Those Docs are a hard act to follow.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom in his pursuit of a mouse named Jerry and the rivalry between the two characters. When Ginger brings home a kitten that she will foster until she finds it a forever home, everyone in the house falls in love with the kitten except for Tom. When Spike and Jerry see that Tom has become a bad influence on the kitten, a dragged-out fight ensues, and the only thing that will end it is the news that the kitten has a new home...

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Rick buys the Suck-Up and at first Tom enjoys the machine using it to clean Jerry out of house! But when the Suck-Up takes over the house Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it. / The storm of the century is brewing - at least according to Tuffy and Jerry who are giving a little pay back to Tom for tormenting them earlier. / Its picture day for Spike and Tom but they both end up dirty and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this years picture. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom and Butch compete for the Golden Fez and a chance to be top cat in the United Mouse Catchers they must prove their worth by finally catching Jerry. Butch finds out that Jerry is a tough opponent and also finds that living with Spike and Tyke is no piece of cake.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs at a small sea side town, Lamput meets a lonely sea monster. Lamput attempts to help the sea monster makes friends but all his plans backfires. Now the locals are enraged, and the docs take the opportunity to stir up an angry mob to take down the creature and catch Lamput in the process! Not unless Lamputs new friend has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of "Duplicate" Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates cant be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. They finally manage to sneak past the Librarian, but all chaos erupts when they open a mysterious book in the restricted area. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Beans life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. / Whilst out snapping nature with his camera Mr Bean gets angry when nature snaps back. / Bean discovers that in the world of organised crime a teddy isnt always a teddy. Sometimes its a rabbit. / Mr Bean cant find a parking space so he makes one of his own.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput outsmarts the Docs by luring them onto a street basketball court and pitting them against the toughest ballerz in town. When the jocks look like utterly destroying poor old Specs and Skinny, Lamputs conscience kicks in. Our orange buddy decides to help the Docs out with some of that special brand of court magic. Fate is fickle, though - when it comes out that the Docs are using a performance-enhancing orange blob, the jocks call foul. Specs and Skinny are reminded yet again what it feels like to be dunked on.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance thats even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings dont miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to "gold leaf" the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Beans landlady.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you cant even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new "friend" has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Determined to finish Beethovens symphony, Mr Bean wangles himself a grand piano, a music book, a candelabra - and a very patient piano teacher. Liberace, eat your heart out!.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When the frogspawn in Mr. Beans bath hatch out, its the last thing his landlady needs, especially when shes invited the Mayor for tea. Hundreds of angry amphibians decide to invite themselves as well. Bean proves to be no expert at catching slippery green things that wont stop hopping about all over the blinking place.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun! When a cloud passes overhead, Grizzy realizes that their respective gadgets run on electricity provided by solar panels. No more sun, no more electricity! He devises a plan whereby he will be the only one to access the energy, but the Lemmings have not said their last word!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk. Indeed, when placed inside, the trunk can blend two objects into one! The Lemmings are quicker and get their hands on the trunk, then set out to play with objects they have enhanced. But its Grizzy who discovers the formula that makes you ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table. All except one, who bounces off some jelly pudding which was left behind. When the Lemmings discover its highly spongy texture, they invent a whole bunch of new bouncing games. But Grizzy, starving and dinner-deprived, has his eyes on the dessert!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance. The rodents land upon an ancient Celtic site where they happen upon a magic bracelet that increases the strength of whoever wears it tenfold. The Lemmings start the competition over with their new power, only this time using menhirs! A witness to the scene, Grizzy longs for the magic object and imagines everything he could do with the piece of jewelry.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm. In a secret room, he glimpses a human form by the light of a lightning bolt. Terrified, Grizzy unwittingly sets off a mechanism which had been activated by the lightning, and which brings to life a medieval armor. The living armor bows before the flabbergasted bear. Grizzy has just found a docile and fearsome ally with whom to combat the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen. But Grizzy wants to paint himself on the next painting and swipes the artwork along with the rodents paint kit. The furious Lemmings are determined to recover their material at all costs. Its the beginning of a dispute that could be qualified as… artsy!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle. The rodents catch up with it on a mystical nearby isle, where they meet five fairies. One of them breathes life into the musical instrument. The Lemmings return to the castle with five sets of enchanted pipes and catapult Grizzy far away. Its his turn to discover the mysterious isle.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap. In his prison, Grizzy finds a magic shepherds crook. Now he can direct the neighboring sheep according to his desires. With their help, he manages to escape from his dungeon. He returns to the cabin and settles in on the flock like on a sofa, while the Lemmings stare in disbelief!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship and more. Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - everyone, that is, except for Bibi as she failed to stick her landing. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote to perfect her jump...

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship and more. When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because the Jokers van is too dangerous - when Bam then discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset until the point that Redbird has to bail him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Jestahs insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries not to let the big-wheeled bullys words affect her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley Quinn.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship and more. Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favour - however, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman and his latest mission are suddenly in danger...

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. When the Looney Builders enter a sandcastle building contest, Tweety sees the competition and loses confidence in his idea.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. Daffy causes major setbacks when Chef Hector hires the Looney Builders to build a burger restaurant for him.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. When the Looney Builders help Petunia build a greenhouse, Petunia cant wait for the vegetables in it to grow and tries to speed up the process.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders prepare to host a big holiday lights festival in Looneyburg Park when an unexpected snowstorm prevents Looneyburgers from attending.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes "man overboard" and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Beans flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Beans wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mikk-Mikk ja sõbrad on sunnitud Torikut ning Tatikut võõrustama.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit korraldab kontserdi, et Mampel saaks seenerahvale esineda, aga siis selgub, et Mampli haal pole just kiita...

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Seekord lahevad seenesellid koos Seenepapiga aardejahile.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Tana uritab Mikk-Mikk Kubaralinna elanikele tulevikku ennustada.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings get their hands on a secret weapon that belongs to the Canadian Army: anyone hit with it becomes non-violent.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When they discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. But if they insist on arguing and refuse to share their virtual costumes, they could end up smashing each others faces in for real.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When they find an old book on traditional Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the gorgeous butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear. But to make the Lemmings bow to his authority, he will first have to become a true origami master.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are all lined up on the couch to watch a cartoon film where a mouse plays nasty tricks on a cat. Grizzy, who has decided to take his nap, switches off the TV and confiscates the batteries of the remote control to make sure they cant switch their program back on. But is it wise to frustrate a gang of Lemmings whove been inspired by a gag-filled cartoon?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Once again, Grizzy shows the Lemmings that they just dont measure up to him physically and that the last jar of chocolate spread is for the strongest. The Lemmings find a way around this by increasing the power of a lamp that accelerates plant growth and instantly expand themselves to... bear size.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.sub-title: Never Judge a Bear by Its Cover
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay their hands on a full crate of chocolate spread, which they hide somewhere behind Grizzys back. And since the Lemmings are both prudent and cunning, its impossible to surprise them when they pay a visit to their secret hoard. Until the day Grizzy discovers a magic ring that enables him to take on the appearance of a Lemming.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they arent very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean attempts to build a shady gazebo in the back garden on a scorching hot day. But as he digs into the ground he unearths a huge unexploded bomb. Trying to make Mrs Wicket aware of the danger and save Scrapper and Teddy from being blown to smithereens takes courage nerve and a Bean styled homemade bomb disposal kit.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued. / Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. / The Great Eduardo violinist supreme is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that he claims that he can play the violin better. / Mr Bean is in a trance - barks like a dog and starts to dance.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! / Mr Bean attempts to retrieve his cash card and "accidently" ends up inside a bank vault. / Mr Bean has to look after an injured Mrs Wicket whose demands start to become a pain. / Mr Bean builds a car washing machine that attracts all manner of customers.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: When Chanterelle comes across something Mush-Mush has made, she declares him a genius artist!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: So Bolly can take a break and head off to have fun, our Mushlers insist that they will do all the repairs around Mushton for him. Now Bolly needs to fix all their repairs!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Puff and our Mushlers set out to try and find out what Fung and Miffs special gifts are without them knowing.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chep has created a cloak out of a leaf and Chanterelle thinks its super fashionable.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: To finally bring life-long friends Mushpot and Starmush back together, Truff goes to help Starmush succeed at an impossible challenge set by Musho…

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batman discusses the Batmobiles amazing capabilities and features during an interview at Gothams auto show.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Tired of being treated as a "seedy character" by the people of Oz, Jack Pumpkinhead has the Wizard turn his head into something a little more fun: a pineapple. Jack loves the new look and even gets a girl in the process. But when the spell goes wrong, Jack blames the Wizard, not realizing that Jane Watermelonhead has a secret of her own!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Woozy has been led astray and lost. His doppelganger is a Nome King powered Trojan Horse. Who would have thought Ozma would love him just the same?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Wicked Witch hears wedding bells.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: While the rest of Emerald City sleeps soundly, Toto takes a rescue mission into his own paws!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.sub-title: CapN Bill in Going Nowhere Fast
programme.desc: Its swashbuckling adventure on the high skies.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance thats even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover an old book of magic spells with a formula that enables one to take on the appearance of any other creature. The Lemmings have the bright idea of transforming one their kin into a double of the she-bear Grizzy is madly in love with in order to trick him. How could Grizzy refuse to give his jar of chocolate spread to his sweetheart?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest where they discover a box filled with fortune cookies. One Lemming gets super lucky after eating one. Armed with their magic cookies, the Lemmings set out to confront Grizzy. But each cookie represents a power… or a curse!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After being thrown out of the log cabin by Grizzy, the Lemmings find a dragon statue with a mysterious stone in a temple. Touching the stone makes a fleeting tattoo appear on their bellies, temporarily endowing them with the mastery of Shaolin Kung Fu. The Lemmings return to the cabin and uproot Grizzy with ease! But Grizzy has not said his last word and manages to get hold of the magic stone.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares - with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match - only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Toms being unusually difficult when hes rocked by an epiphany-- HES LOSING HIS HAIR! Paranoid that hes going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it. Think mud packs (more like mud slaps), hair transfers (one word - furballs) deep tissue massage to stimulate follicle development (a.k.a repeated blows to the head), and skunk therapy (nuf said). Most everything he tries only leads to Ginger throwing him in the bath again. Ultimately, Tom realizes that Jerrys spiking his cat shampoo with hair remover and its about to get hairy for the mouse!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Toms hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case, hes sent to recover at the local animal hospital. But a detective is never off the case! Tom begins to suspect the answer to the case theyre working on is right under his broken nose. Problem is, hes in traction and cant move. Thats okay, hes got a partner in crime-solving - Doc Jerry makes the rounds at the animal hospital and solves the mystery, but not before sending Tom on the rounds to endure various tests (e.g. x-rays, stress test, physical therapy, etc…) and to do some investigating of his own.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom accidentally puts a spell on Santa that transforms him into a cookie. When he cant figure out how to transform him back Tom and Jerry volunteer to help Santa deliver gifts. A Christmas miracle occurs when Tom and Jerry sacrifice their own gifts for each other.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry save King Arthurs kingdom from and evil sorcerer Morgan. / A bet between two farmers over who can raise the biggest pig goes haywire for the farm hands. / An ancient flying machine is discovered in Postlewaite Manor. / An oompah land retelling of the Rumplestiltskein story. / A couple of tricksters use Lil Quacker as their "magnificent" side show act in order to bilk the locals out of their cash. / From the security of his treehouse, Tom wages battle with Spike and Jerry. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A lost little lamb appears at Maudes farm.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A Tom and Jerry take on the Johnny Appleseed story.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is mistakenly placed in a shelter for homeless animals and forced to join the shelters rock-n-roll while Jerry lives the life of Riley back home.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs, Lamput stumbles into a hole in the ground, which leads in an underground civilization with a large tribe in it! Lamput gets misunderstood as the Chosen One according to the tribes prophecy. The tribe hails Lamput as the prophet and this proves to be a huge challenge for the Docs to catch Lamput, now that Lamput is surrounded by worshippers and guards at all times!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tired of the daily chores at home, Lamput buys a bottle of Super-Strength potion from a roadside salesman! A happy and super-strong Lamput now wraps up his chores with extra ease! When the Docs sneak up to catch him, they get accidentally knocked out by Lamput. Finally, the Docs realize Lamputs secret! They steal the biggest bottle of Super-Strength potion and pour it all over themselves. The Docs super-actions backfire and eventually land them in jail - all this with Lamput blissfully unaware of all that happened!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput outsmarts the Docs by luring them onto a street basketball court and pitting them against the toughest ballerz in town. When the jocks look like utterly destroying poor old Specs and Skinny, Lamputs conscience kicks in. Our orange buddy decides to help the Docs out with some of that special brand of court magic. Fate is fickle, though - when it comes out that the Docs are using a performance-enhancing orange blob, the jocks call foul. Specs and Skinny are reminded yet again what it feels like to be dunked on.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Gothams annual dog show is tonight, and Harley plans to compete for the prized "Best in Show" ribbon. Sensing shes up to no good, Robin decides to enter rough-and-tumble Ace the Bat-Dog to keep an eye on the thieving trickster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice and Lewis find the twins frozen in place! It turns out to be the doing of a young Freeze-All Cutie-Twee who has become friends with Charlie. In fact, these two besties are having the time of their lives, traveling all over the place, freezing the whole Kingdom, unaware that the young Cutie-Twee has not yet mastered its powers! Alice and Lewis must find a way to persuade Charlie to take the Cutie-Twee back to its peers.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: When the Wonderland cuckoos realize their precious wild strawberry pies have all been picked, its mayhem! They go bonkers, screeching up a storm, almost deafening our poor friends. The Queen subsequently orders Alice and Lewis to put an end to this din! But the mission gets tricky when our two heroes find out who picked the pies!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Determined to save the community garden, Barney and the kids go on a magical adventure where they become butterflies, and help a little ladybug with a big problem. They ultimately learn that doing small things can affect big change!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: David cant agree on what to play, so the kids end up playing different games. Barney has a hard time keeping up with both games. Silly chaos ensues, and David is reminded that its important to consider others perspectives, too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame well never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom blows on a trumpet to dislodge Jerry from his hiding place, which leads to Frankie the rat convincing Tom hes a great trumpeter. Frankie plays manager, Jerry joins in as percussionist, and they audition neighborhood animals for a third member of their jazz trio. Unfortunately, when Spike is chosen on the upright double bass, rivalries spark up and nerves threaten the trios success.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Overweight Jerry starts working out on a weight machine supplied to him by cousin Muscles. Not to be oudone Tom starts lifting weights as well which sets up an epic battle royale between the cat and mouse.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom becomes obsessed with his new crinkle ball and drives the rest of the household crazy, chasing it around.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Mice visitors from Mars force Tom to change the way he treats Jerry.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired to find a missing priceless Maltese Pigeon.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom accidentally puts a spell on Santa that transforms him into a cookie. When he cant figure out how to transform him back Tom and Jerry volunteer to help Santa deliver gifts. A Christmas miracle occurs when Tom and Jerry sacrifice their own gifts for each other.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance thats even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a magicians hat that tosses out objects stored inside beforehand with the tap of a magic wand. He decides to impress his beloved she-bear with a magicians act. But he will have to work around the Lemmings, who have the gift of coming out of the hat at the wrong moment.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to try out the brand new packaging format of chocolate spread that he discovers in the rangers cupboard: a yummy-looking XXL jar. And he does not intend to share it with the Lemmings. After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities, one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV, Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car, his favorite she-bear would be interested in him. He decides to confiscate the Lemmings crate on wheels and give it a serious overhaul. The Lemmings have nothing against an upgrade, as long as they remain behind the wheel!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they dont. The honeymoon suite is like nothing theyve ever seen; the Docs sheen of respectability quickly evaporates when theres robes to wear and beds to jump on. Their taste of the good life doesnt last long, though; another Lamput chase results in a proper trashed hotel room, just like you read about. Then downstairs for some à la carte chaos in the hotel restaurant. Its bad news for the Docs when the tab comes due; a Lab wage wont cover these extras.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert - but he has to disguise himself as an old-aged pensioner or he wont be allowed on the coach. Once on the coach Bean drives everyone mad with his anti-boredom antics.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down.
